title: Rumor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Spread a rumor about a player each night.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spreading a rumor about a player will cause them to become Hated. Only they will be notified about this.
- Hated players will require one less vote to lynch.
- You may not spread a rumor about yourself or any other Mafia members.

desc:
Post 312
*I'm the one you're leaving her for.*
